name: ☛Zigzag Dash: Left or Right?☚ A Pinball Style Game
name_original: ☛Zigzag Dash: Left or Right?☚ A Pinball Style Game
description:
Zigzag Dash is a pinball style adventure in a geometry board. You will have to control a mouth and training to accomplish some tasks in the board before time finished. Seems dumb, isn't it? But ways are endless and only the fastest players will success in this zigzag pinball odyssey. Choose left or right to complete tasks and be careful...

Items in this endless zigzag dash:
-Slow barrier: it moves slowly...tap to help your mouth to not to die!
-Fast barrier: it moves quickly! tap in the right moment or you will die!
-Teleportation: until next teleportation item in pinball board!
-Switch off: one of these dumb ways to make harder this adventure...turn on lights as soon as possible!
-Push back: to a previous push back item
-Cancell item: items will be called off for a while...Take advantage with it in this odyssey!
-Ball: avoid it to not to die!
-Laser: inverts movements, so left will be right and right will be left! Is your brain ready? :P

Complete tasks to get experience points to level up! Tasks are also a good training for your brain to reach upper levels!
An endless adventure and a perfect training for your brain!
Find the best ways and avoid dumb movements to be the best! Enjoy this endless geometry odyssey in zigzag!
